// frontend/src/components/SupplierList.js
import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SupplierList(){const[suppliers,setSuppliers]=useState([]);const[form,setForm]=useState({name:'',contact:'',email:''});useEffect(()=>{fetchSuppliers();},[]);const fetchSuppliers=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/suppliers');setSuppliers(res.data);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/suppliers',form);setForm({name:'',contact:'',email:''});fetchSuppliers();}catch(err){console.error(err);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Suppliers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name",value:form.name,onChange:e=>setForm({...form,name:e.target.value}),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Contact",value:form.contact,onChange:e=>setForm({...form,contact:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:form.email,onChange:e=>setForm({...form,email:e.target.value}),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Supplier"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Contact"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:suppliers.map(supplier=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:supplier.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:supplier.contact}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:supplier.email})]},supplier.id))})]})]});}export default SupplierList;
